item.title: 【UPSCALED】Sting and Shaggy - Don't Make Me Wait (One Drop Remix) [4K AI Upscale | HEVC 10-bit | PCM]
item.description:
Genre: Reggae, Pop
Year: 2018
Video Source: Apple Music, thanks SonMaxime!
Audio Source: Qobuz, CD quality, 16-bit 44.1 kHz

"Don't Make Me Wait", is a song by English musician Sting and Jamaican musician Shaggy, written by Sting, Orville Burrell, Ashante Reid, Shaun Pizzonia, Kameron Quintin Jones and Kennard Garrett. It's the fifth track and the first single from 44/876, a collaborative album by Sting and Shaggy, released on 20 April 2018 by A&M Records, Interscope Records and Cherrytree Records. The album won an award for Best Reggae Album at the 61st Grammy Awards in February 2019.

The album's title refers to the country calling code for the United Kingdom (+44) and the North American area code for Jamaica (876), Sting's and Shaggy's respective home countries.

"Don't Make Me Wait" was also included in Sting's Duets album in 2021.

Release Info
The video track is upscaled with Topaz Video AI and encoded to HEVC 10-bit.
The first PCM track is the One Drop Remix and the second is the regular mix.
Both PCM tracks (Qobuz, 16-bit 44.1 kHz) are synced with Adobe Audition.
The timed lyrics are created from scratch. Enable the subtitles to see the lyrics.
